info.author: DataShop datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: This component will compute high- and low-stakes error rates for skills in a specified KC model in a given DataShop dataset.
info.inputs: None - The component only works for datasets already loaded into DataShop.
info.outputs: tab-delimited - Generated output is a three-column, tab-delimited file. First column is a skill name, second is the average high-stakes error rate and the third column is the average low-stakes error rate.
info.options:
Dataset - DataShop dataset
KC model - Name of the KC model
